item.title: Terraform as an automation tool
item.description: aamdevsecops-terraform Link to heading This is a small project to demonstrate infrastructure automation with IaC for a GCP demo project in order to speed up networks, subnets, instances and firewall creation. How to use Link to heading terraform init terraform plan terraform apply
